thread.section_title: Soltech Security Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soltech Security | www.soltechsecurity.com
thread.title: Preston Thomas
thread.title_full: Soltech Security reviewed by Preston Thomas

author: Preston Thomas
title: Preston Thomas
text: I had to call Soltech Security about extra camera cables that I needed and the representative was very quick and technically savvy about the information. I intend to purchase in the near future extra cameras and I will certainly use this company. I would also recommend them to family and friends.
